trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Command" name="Command" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref uid="langword_csharp_Command" name="Command" href=""> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The `Command` event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il `Command` evento viene generato quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>pulsante di controllo in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>è fatto clic sull'oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs class is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to access information about the event that was raised.
trans-unit.target: La classe DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs viene utilizzata internamente dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodi per accedere alle informazioni sull'evento che è stato generato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs class, see the DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza della classe DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs, vedere il costruttore DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per inizializzare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo costruttore viene utilizzato principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli, la generazione di eventi.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente illustra i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>|The value of the `item` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>| Il valore di `item` parametro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| Il valore di `commandSource` parametro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"></xref> object that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"> </xref> oggetto che ha generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: L'origine dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The original event data that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName*> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument*> properties.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento originale che contiene il <> </> *> e <> </> *> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il controllo che ha generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Controllo che ha generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"></xref> object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"> </xref> oggetto che contiene il controllo che ha generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà dell'elemento per recuperare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the pager field object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà rappresenta l'oggetto di campo del pager contenente il controllo che ha generato l'evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà rappresenta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"></xref> object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"> </xref> oggetto che contiene il controllo che ha generato l'evento.
